name: Ahmad Al-Qattu
title: Introduction
content: I’m a software developer who transforms ideas into practical, dependable applications. Working across the full stack, I create stable and efficient solutions—whether building web platforms, mobile products, or integrated backend services. My aim is always to deliver software that people find useful, accessible, and easy to trust.

data.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer | React & Python Enthusiast
data.highlight: Transforming Ideas into Modern, Scalable Solutions

title: Skills
content: Over the years, I've gained experience across multiple domains, from front-end UI development to back-end services and databases.

title: Projects
content: Here are some of the projects I have worked on. They include web apps, mobile apps, and various open-source contributions.

projects.name: Project Alpha
projects.description: A web application built with React and Node.js.

projects.name: Project Beta
projects.description: A mobile app developed using React Native.

projects.name: Project Gamma
projects.description: An open-source library for data visualization.

title: Contact
content: Feel free to reach out to me via email or LinkedIn for collaborations or inquiries.
